page.title: 07A YEAR IN THE LIFE OF SCHOOL
page.content: {Summer Term.}The best fun is sports day, but we also do swimming, have a swimming gala, go on outings and take part in the area sports at Shobrooke. What is not so good is reports! At the end of the school year there is an end of term service, led by all the school leavers before going to secondary school.{Autumn Term.}We have a harvest thanksgiving service in the chapel next to the school and bring things like fruit, vegetables and cakes. At Christmas we have parties and entertainment which we do for our parents.{Spring Term.}The football and netball teams play in tournaments. This year some of us went to the Wembworthy Centre for a week's residential and science course.{All {Year.}The dentist and school doctor come regularly, so does the school nurse.
